gov.ornl.keva.table

Class TableExternal

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.keva.table.TableValue
      • gov.ornl.keva.table.TableExternal

  • public class TableExternal
extends TableValue
    Used for data that is stored locally in a file.

      • setTotalSize

        Set the total size of the file contents.

      • setOffset

        protected void setOffset(long o)
        Offsets are used so that we can continue referring to the 1st, 2nd, etc. index in the middle of the file.

      • getChunkSize

        public long getChunkSize()
        The chunk size defines how large of an in-memory buffer to use when reading data.
        Returns:
        Chunk size

      • getChunkStart

        public long getChunkStart()
        The chunk start index defines where in the file the data is initially read from.
        Returns:
        Chunk index

      • getData

        public byte[] getData()
        Get all the data associated with this value. Since the data resides in a file, the content must first be read into an in-memory buffer. This method must be called multiple times to read the entire file if the file size exceeds the user-defined chunk size.
        Overrides:
        getData in class TableValue
        Returns:
        Table value data

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes()
        Serialize the table value.
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        Serialized table value

      • subset

        public TableValue subset(long index,
                long size)
        Create a new external table value that is a subset of the current value.
        Parameters:
        index - Start of the file
        size - Size of the file
        Returns:
        A new external value

        Get the size of the data.
        Overrides:

      • memory

        public long memory()
        Get the memory usage of the data. This is usually the same as the "size", but not always.
        Overrides:
        memory in class TableValue
        Returns:
        Bytes used
